title: Antique lamp (One Small Favour)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The antique lamp is an item obtained from Yanni Salika after completing the One Small Favour quest. Two are given to the player, and each lamp grants 10,000 experience in a skill of the player's choosing, given that the skill is over level 30. The lamp cannot be banked, and cannot be reclaimed if destroyed, unlike antique lamps from certain quests.

The antique lamp is an item obtained from Yanni Salika after completing the One Small Favour quest. Two are given to the player, and each lamp grants 10,000 experience in a skill of the player's choosing, given that the skill is over level 30. The lamp cannot be banked, and cannot be reclaimed if destroyed, unlike antique lamps from certain quests.

[[File:Antique lamp (One Small Favour) detail.png|left|180px]]
The '''antique lamp''' is an item obtained from [[Yanni Salika]] after completing the [[One Small Favour]] [[quest]]. Two are given to the player, and each lamp grants 10,000 [[experience]] in a [[skill]] of the player's choosing, given that the skill is over level 30. The lamp cannot be banked, and '''cannot''' be reclaimed if destroyed, unlike antique lamps from certain quests.

{{One Small Favour}}
{{Experience lamp}}
